Text: Mitzvah Day ReminderJust a note to remind you that Sunday November th is Mitzvah Day If you havent signed up just stop by our late registration table and well be happy to assign you to a project When you come to the Temple opening ceremonies are at am please bring nonperishable food and good used clothing for the needy in our community Were having a blood drive in the Board Room Help save a life The Jewish Family Service TaySachs screening will be held at the Jewish Community Center Hope to see you Sunday
